showerReviews.reviewText: Stayed two nights primitive camping site #177 and #175 are shaded for most of day only one other site next to you plenty of room for two tents shower restrooms all very clean and in working order nice stay

‚Ä¶ wasn't that much geese residue if you know what I mean laying around. Everyone was having fun it wasn't real crowded and the water was great. The restrooms in the shower areas were very clean. I just wish there were a few more barbecue pits

Nice large sandy beach with plenty of parking. The beach area offered a playground, picnic shelters, restroom and shower facilities. The grounds and building were very well maintained. What a great place to spend tome time unwinding on a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ hot day. Added to the water where you can swim is a playground for kids. There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking. You can sit anywhere and barbeque and play your music, celebrate birthday and much more. You can also ‚Ä¶
It was nice to go to this place on this hot day , There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking

‚Ä¶ The only draw back is the cold water shower after a long day‚Äôs swim. Yes the shower is icy cold, but you may decide to take a shower back at home. Otherwise in every respect this is a nice beach for Columbus!
Not well, I car camp traveling across the US. And was very disappointed with no water or access to shower.

Very relaxing the beach area was recently cleaned very quiet for summer. Playground for the kids is nice bathrooms an shower available. Snack machines an soda available. Nice for picnic or walk or just relaxing in the sun.

‚Ä¶ ! There are also food trucks in the summer if you didn't BBQ! Cool summer classic place in the Midwest! It's not Florida or pure Michigan! The water is dirty! They do have showers! My suggestion if you use the water use the shower!! üëå!! ‚Ä¶

The water is sweet, ppl are nice, to see all the families there having fun is a great experience. The park is amazingly fun for the kid's.  There's food trucks, ice cream truck nd bathrooms/shower.
Familyfuntime. Beachtime

showerReviews.reviewText: We enjoy taking our pup to this park and letting him run off leash when no one else is there. It's a great open space with a nice playground, a community garden, several ball fields, a public restroom that's clean and well kept, a free tiny library and is conveniently close to the rec center.

showerReviews.reviewText: Caters to all ages, very fun park for kids and adults. Restrooms are available, so is a picnic area. There's a basketball section, volleyball section, a decent amount of land to kick a ball, a sandpit and a nice trail for biking or walking.

This place is just fantastic to go with your family üë™ especially children there is lots of  play attraction for kids ..theater for show music sometimes...basketball stadium and volleyball too....clean restroom..the other side you have flow with falls ...I like this space is shaded too and good for relaxing mind . ‚Ä¶

We had a church cookout at the shelter. The shelter itself was not cleaned. There was what looked like milk between tables pooled.Ranger came by and emptied some trash containers.Bathroom hasn't been swept in a while, Cobb webs, sinks and toilets not cleaned.

Nice shelter house with electrical power and a fireplace. Large , clean picnic tables. Sand volleyball, baseball field, basketball hoops, and a very nice playground for kids with a wide range of activities. Even fishing nearby (careful of the small dam!) Only PortaPotties when we were there, but restrooms open later in the season.

showerReviews.reviewText: I've only been to the lap pool twice... And it was real real hot so it wasn't packed. But the facility was clean, almost all the chairs are shaded by spectacular trees, the local ducks swim with you sometimes. You can actually use the ‚Ä¶

I wanted to share some feedback regarding the lap pool this year. Unfortunately, I‚Äôve noticed the cleanliness has not been up to the same standards as in previous years. It often looks like chlorine is being added but the lap pool isn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

The have a little swimsuit tumble dryer that is quite nice to use before leaving. Lockers are free but it is bring your own lock, unlike the built in ones at the Rec center. There are only 2 family changing rooms l.
Absolutely amazing! Clean , fun and refreshing!
